title: Behind the Story: Safety measures needed for AI therapy
description: A leading expert on Artificial Intelligence has warned that safety measures need to be put in place to deal with the increasing use of AI for therapy and the Government needs to consider a ban on some AI therapy.
content:

title: Energy market realities poses hurdle for Trump’s coal revival
description: Some argue that coal is needed to meet growing energy demand, which is increasing due to the rise of databases and artificial intelligence.
content:
The realities of the energy market may jeopardize President Donald Trump’s push to renew what he calls “beautiful clean coal,” an industry that has declined for decades as it faces competition with other energy sources.

title: Elon Musk Takes On Bill Gates' Microsoft With 'Macrohard'. What It Is
description: Elon Musk has launched a new artificial intelligence (AI) venture under his xAI initiative, taking on the mighty Microsoft. The project, Macrohard, was announced by Musk on X (formerly Twitter) on August 22.
content: Elon Musk has launched a new artificial intelligence (AI) venture under his xAI initiative, taking on the mighty Microsoft. The project, Macrohard, was announced by Musk on X (formerly Twitter) on August 22. “It's a tongue-in-cheek name, but the proj... [3280 chars]

title: ‘Never…’: World’s oldest living person turns 116, credits longevity to THIS rule she’s followed all her life
description: Her life has spanned two world wars, six monarchs in the UK and 27 prime ministers. From the Edwardian era to the rise of artificial intelligence, Caterham has seen it all.
content:
Ethel Caterham, born August 21, 1909 in Hampshire, England, has been officially recognised by Guinness World Records as the world’s oldest living person at 116. This follows the passing of Brazilian nun Sister Inah Canabarro earlier this year.

title: A 9-point checklist to improve AI-based image analysis in pathology
description: A new article in Veterinary Pathology introduces a 9-point checklist designed to improve the reporting quality of studies that use artificial intelligence (AI)-based automated image analysis (AIA). As AI tools become more widely used in pathology-based research, concerns have emerged about the reproducibility and transparency of published findings.

title: Goa Champions Digital Revolution: Unveiling AI-Driven Governance
description: Goa is embracing a digital transformation by leveraging artificial intelligence and emerging technologies to foster inclusive and citizen-centric governance. Under the Goa AI Mission 2027, the state is building a future-ready environment aimed at enhancing efficiency through creativity and inclusivity within the governance framework.
content:
Goa is leading a digital transformation in India by using artificial intelligence and emerging technologies to foster more inclusive and citizen-focused governance, announced state Minister Rohan Khaunte.

title: OpenAI To Set Up First India Office This Year; CEO Altman To Visit Next Month
description: According to OpenAI, the establishment of the India office reflects its support for the IndiaAI Mission and commitment to partnering with the government to build Artificial Intelligence (AI) for India, with India
